data.quote: To iterate is human, to recurse divine.
data.author: Peter Deutsch

data.quote: Donâ€™t take rest after your first victory because if you fail in second, more lips are waiting to say that your first victory was just luck.
data.author: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Dream, dream, dream. Dreams transform into thoughts and thoughts result in action.
data.author: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
data.author: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: All of us do not have equal talent. But , all of us have an equal opportunity to develop our talents.
data.author: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: The more you sweat in peace, the less you bleed in war.
data.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

data.quote: Anyone can deal with victory. Only the mighty can bear defeat.
data.author: Adolf Hitler

data.quote: Do not compare yourself to others. If you do so, you are insulting yourself.
data.author: Adolf Hitler

data.quote: He alone, who owns the youth, gains the future.
data.author: Adolf Hitler

data.quote: I am the greatest, I said that even before I knew I was.
data.author: Muhammad Ali
